DOC.detailed_description: All eligible patient randomly assign one two group : Group 1 ( control ) receive inhalation epinephrine 1mg , 2cc 0.9 % saline solution four time day , nasal drop 0.9 % saline nostril every twelve hour . Group 2 - study group receive four inhalation 0.9 % saline four time day one nasal drop xylometazoline HCL nostril twice day . This treatment continue patient ready discharge . Patients examine evaluate study entry re-evaluated every 10-12 hour . Length hospital stay , time improve Oxygen saturation , time need IV fluid clinical score two group treatment compare .
